name: Dodge Triangle and Shoot Circle
description:
Made in 2 days !
In this game, you have to dodge the triangle and shoot the circle (more info in the tutorial of the game).
It can be played on mobile and you just need to use mouse/touch screen. Much harder on mobile !
The music start after a few seconds and I don't know why :(
https://liluo.io/boumety/noname Link to liluo and I don't know I can't put the right name :(

All the art was done by me (bad idea) and for the sound I use jfxr. I also made the music myself with beatbox.

This is my first game and first game jam so it's not something extraordinary.

(also, I don't speak english so there are probably mistakes)
